name: Addic7ed (subtitles) zen blue style
description: Less flashy colors and compact style.
additional_info:
Better with the following uBlock Origin custom rules (social and ads filtering) :

www.addic7ed.com##OBJECT
www.addic7ed.com##A[href="http://twitter.com/addic7ed"]
www.addic7ed.com##A[href="irc://irc.efnet.net:6667/addic7ed"]
www.addic7ed.com##A[id="facebooksticker"]
www.addic7ed.com##INPUT[name="submit"][src="https://www.paypalobjects.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donateCC_LG.gif"]
www.addic7ed.com##BUTTON[class="bitcoinate"]
www.addic7ed.com##DIV[id="___plusone_0"]
www.addic7ed.com##IFRAME[src^="//www.facebook.com/"]
www.addic7ed.com##[class=" fb_iframe_widget"]
www.addic7ed.com##IFRAME[id^="twitter-widget"]
www.addic7ed.com##IFRAME[src^="http://www.facebook"]
www.addic7ed.com##SCRIPT[src^="http://www.facebook"]
www.addic7ed.com##A[class="twitter-share-button"]
www.addic7ed.com##FB\:LIKE
www.addic7ed.com##G\:PLUSONE
www.addic7ed.com##body > center:nth-of-type(1) > table > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(5) > td > iframe
www.addic7ed.com##center:nth-of-type(1) > table > tbody > tr:nth-of-type(5) > td:nth-of-type(2)
www.addic7ed.com##DIV[alt="Donation Status"]
www.addic7ed.com##a[href^="https://www.patreon.com/bePatron"]
